text: Boom.

Well, there's a time here you can see that is the mean time to identify what the problem is,
according to Ponemon Institute's survey in 2022.
The mean time to identify is on the order of 200 days.
That's how long it takes to figure out that the bad guy is already in your system,
and further still, there's this notion of meantime to contain, and the meantime to contain is on the order of 70 days.

but they're investigating things that maybe have not fully happened yet or in the process of happening.

What are we going to use?

Well, they would use some tools like an XDR, extended detection and response capability.
